title: efialtis
author: efialtis
created_time: May 31, 2023, 11:18:30 AMLast edit: June 02, 2023, 07:45:15 AM by efialtis

comments.author: Martingaleboy
comments.body: Does this means i get paid after 1 month ? (Too long )Or directly after i send the screenshot ?I think i have account through your website.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: Martingaleboy on May 31, 2023, 07:49:19 PMDoes this means i get paid after 1 month ? (Too long )Or directly after i send the screenshot ?I think i have account through your website. Non of the above, because this is a giveaway contest of which you stand a chance to win or not win anything, as they never said its compulsory that if you take part you shall be rewarded, because from my observation, I guess the €5000 is expected to be share among only 5 lucky persons who will follow all the rules as stated above, and you never can tell you might be the lucky one to win (i.e €2500, €1500, €1000, €750 or €100). But I guess O.P is in a better position to explain more.

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoHeadlineNews on May 31, 2023, 08:43:27 PMQuote from: Martingaleboy on May 31, 2023, 07:49:19 PMDoes this means i get paid after 1 month ? (Too long )Or directly after i send the screenshot ?I think i have account through your website. I guess the €5000 is expected to be share among only 5 lucky persons who will follow all the rules as stated above, and you never can tell you might be the lucky one to win (i.e €2500, €1500, €1000, €750 or €100). But I guess O.P is in a better position to explain more.Not 5 person but 10 person. 5th to 10th place will receive 100€ each.@efialtis, There’s a typo error on the prize distribution. There’s 2 1st place which the one should be 3rd place.I have inquiry too, If I deposit 300€ on first day then withdraw my balance after my gambling session. Does my deposit on the next day is still counted for another ticket?

comments.author: efialtis
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoHeadlineNews on May 31, 2023, 08:43:27 PMQuote from: Martingaleboy on May 31, 2023, 07:49:19 PMDoes this means i get paid after 1 month ? (Too long )Or directly after i send the screenshot ?I think i have account through your website. Non of the above, because this is a giveaway contest of which you stand a chance to win or not win anything, as they never said its compulsory that if you take part you shall be rewarded, because from my observation, I guess the €5000 is expected to be share among only 5 lucky persons who will follow all the rules as stated above, and you never can tell you might be the lucky one to win (i.e €2500, €1500, €1000, €750 or €100). But I guess O.P is in a better position to explain more.That`s correct - you collect tickets for every €50 deposited and in the end, there will be a raffle.  As another user stated, there will be 10 prizes in total though, at least... wouldn`t be too much of a surprise if we even sent some additional prizes if we see some good action.  Quote from: dimonstration on June 01, 2023, 08:57:42 AMQuote from: CryptoHeadlineNews on May 31, 2023, 08:43:27 PMQuote from: Martingaleboy on May 31, 2023, 07:49:19 PMDoes this means i get paid after 1 month ? (Too long )Or directly after i send the screenshot ?I think i have account through your website. I guess the €5000 is expected to be share among only 5 lucky persons who will follow all the rules as stated above, and you never can tell you might be the lucky one to win (i.e €2500, €1500, €1000, €750 or €100). But I guess O.P is in a better position to explain more.Not 5 person but 10 person. 5th to 10th place will receive 100€ each.@efialtis, There’s a typo error on the prize distribution. There’s 2 1st place which the one should be 3rd place.I have inquiry too, If I deposit 300€ on first day then withdraw my balance after my gambling session. Does my deposit on the next day is still counted for another ticket?Thanks for pointing this out - I will ask jayce to correct! Yes, of course it does.

comments.author: efialtis
comments.body: Fellow Bitcointalkers, this is now ON!  Any issues and/or account requests, don`t hesitate to contact me.

comments.author: Mahdirakib
comments.body: @efialtis, I have some questions regarding the giveaway.How you will count the entries and how the prize draw will be made?Will you draw the 1st rank winner at first, or 10th rank winner at first?Do we need to send you an email after each deposit, or can we submit the entries on the last day of the giveaway by including all the deposit details in a single message?

comments.author: efialtis
comments.created_time: June 03, 2023, 10:40:42 AMLast edit: June 03, 2023, 10:51:17 AM by efialtis
comments.body: Quote from: Mahdirakib on June 03, 2023, 10:10:55 AM@efialtis, I have some questions regarding the giveaway.How you will count the entries and how the prize draw will be made?Will you draw the 1st rank winner at first, or 10th rank winner at first?Do we need to send you an email after each deposit, or can we submit the entries on the last day of the giveaway by including all the deposit details in a single message?1. Total deposit sum of a user will be divided by 50, every user will get a number after the event`s end and the prize draw will be made using https://www.random.org/2. We will go from 1st to 10th3. You can do as you see fit, both totally fine

comments.author: Martingaleboy
comments.body: I have an account under btcgosu and made a lot of deposits on it during 2021 /2022Can i still be elegible?

Quote"Starting on 02.06.2023, our giveaway will run for an entire month, giving you plenty of time to get in on the action.

comments.author: Csmiami
comments.body: So, after doing the random giveaway; I can proudly say that the winners are as follows:1st- Mahdii2nd- Ivan3rd- Shin234th- sagehoch5th- dimon6969Please, send an email to admin@btcgosu.com with a bitcoin address for the prize payments (unless there's any change). Congratulations to all the winners and participants; and shall this act as a reminder that there's always a chance of winning big when participating in our events!
